Lines.en: We lived! Take that, planks and zombies and seaweed!
Lines.zh: 我们熬下来了！刚刚那招怎么样啊，僵尸们！

Lines.en: Indeed, User Dave, piracy is not a victimless crime.
Lines.zh: 说得没错，用户戴夫，海盗总是带来更多伤害。

Lines.en: These advanced plants are egregious and unfair!
Lines.zh: 使用这些跨时代的植物真是恶劣又不公！

Lines.en: The timbers be shivered! The seas are ablaze!
Lines.zh: 桅杆将要撕裂！海面将会燃烧！

Lines.en: Your doom is assured! Your mind is a haze!
Lines.zh: 你必死无疑！你的颅内将只剩混沌！

Lines.en: The Zombot Plank Walker 2.0 shall soon rule the waves!
Lines.zh: 我的甲板漫步者 2.0 即将统治浪潮！

Lines.en: Ai-yowza! Our lawnmowers have walked some planks!
Lines.zh: 哎哟喂！我们的小推车可能自己跳下甲板了！

Lines.en: The temporal energies are too powerful for them, User Dave.
Lines.zh: 时空能量对它们来说过于强大了，用户戴夫。

Lines.en: We cannot allow even a single zombie past our defenses.
Lines.zh: 我们不能再让任何一只僵尸越过我们的防线了。

Lines.en: I see more seas! Arrrr there more zombies?
Lines.zh: 我看到了更远的海平面！额惹惹惹，还有更多地僵尸？

Lines.en: More pirate zombies have appeared, and with greater strength.
Lines.zh: 更多的海盗僵尸出现了，他们更加精壮。

Lines.en: We may need to retreat to another timeline and return when our plants are stronger.
Lines.zh: 或许我们该暂时撤退到其他时间线，带着更强大的植物回来应战。

Lines.en: Please, tell me about your creation process.
Lines.zh: 请告诉我您当初的创造流程。

Lines.en: It was pretty easy! I found some timey wabby wabbo stuff.
Lines.zh: 很简单的！我当时找到了一堆哇啦哇啦的时空玩意。

Lines.en: Then I put it between two slices of bread...
Lines.zh: 然后把它们夹在两片面包中间……

Lines.en: BOOM! Awesome sandwich!
Lines.zh: 轰！超级美味的三明治！

Lines.en: Such proliferous bunk. I should have expected as much.
Lines.zh: 只是问出来一堆废话，我早该料到的。

Lines.en: I'll have the answers someday, when David's brains are on my plate.
Lines.zh: 等我夺到了戴夫的脑子，我会得到答案的。

Lines.en: I've discovered a mysterious trait in your rattletrap time machine.
Lines.zh: 我在你的那嘎吱响的时光机里发现了一个秘密。

Lines.en: Its temporal signature is nearly identical to my own creations.
Lines.zh: 它的时间相性与我自己的创作几乎完全相同。

Lines.en: Explain to me, how was this "Penny" created in the first place?
Lines.zh: 请向我解释一下，这个“潘妮”是从哪里来的？

Lines.en: Could I really be some form of Zombot?
Lines.zh: 难不成我是博士机甲的另一种变体？

Lines.en: User Dave, am I the daughter of Dr. Zomboss?
Lines.zh: 用户戴夫，我是僵尸博士的发明之一吗？

Lines.en: That was one fine sandwich! So, what did I miss?
Lines.zh: 我刚吃了一份美味的三明治！额，你们刚刚在聊啥呢？

Lines.en: Remember, protect those plants.
Lines.zh: 记住，要保护好那些植物。

Lines.en: And don't let those beans walk the plank.
Lines.zh: 而且别让那些豆子被抓去走甲板。

Lines.en: It's low tide and the waves are coming in.
Lines.zh: 现在处于低潮时段，而且马上潮水就要汹涌而来。

Lines.en: Grab your water wings! We're going to get wet.
Lines.zh: 戴好水翼！我们要被淹没了。

Lines.en: Target score activated. Let's see if you can beat my high score.
Lines.zh: 检测到需要达到目标分数，看看你能不能破我的纪录。

Lines.en: And put in KRZYDV as your initials.
Lines.zh: 而且得输入 KRZYDV 作为你的姓名首字母缩写。

Lines.en: Hail fellow Captain,
Lines.zh: 向您敬礼，船长，

Lines.en: Be advised that your sailing vessel is of insufficient size.
Lines.zh: 在此提醒您，您的船帆尺寸不匹配。

Lines.en: Sincerely, Dr. Edgar Zomboss.
Lines.zh: 此致，埃德加·僵尸博士。

Lines.en: Huh? What's that now?
Lines.zh: 呃，这次又是什么情况？

Lines.en: We're gonna need a bigger boat.
Lines.zh: 我们可能需要一条更大的船了。

Lines.en: Finally, one of these pirates dropped some booty!
Lines.zh: 终于有带着金银财宝的水手被我们收拾了！

Lines.en: I'm detecting something more challenging than treasure inside.
Lines.zh: 我检测到这堆财宝中有更危险的东西要来。

Lines.en: I thought we were trying to get back home and get your taco.
Lines.zh: 我已经尽力想办法回到旧家然后再找玉米卷了。

Lines.en: But Pirates! Hang on to your parrots and peg legs!
Lines.zh: 但是这里全是海盗！赶紧准备好你的鹦鹉和假腿！

Lines.en: I thought we were trying to get back home and get your taco.
Lines.zh: 我已经尽力想办法回到旧家然后再找玉米卷了。

Lines.en: But Pirates! Hang on to your parrots and peg legs!
Lines.zh: 但是这里全是海盗！赶紧准备好你的鹦鹉和假腿！

Lines.en: I'm sweaty! And we did it!
Lines.zh: 真是捏了把冷汗！我们做到了！

Lines.en: We may travel to other timelines freely, User Dave.
Lines.zh: 我们接下来可以在其他时间线自由穿梭了，用户戴夫。

Lines.en: But I detect further timeline expansions in the future.
Lines.zh: 但我检测到其他时间线也有拓展部分等待我们的修复。

Lines.en: I'll defeat you then, pyramid-iots!
Lines.zh: 然后你们就会被我击垮，住金字塔的白痴们！

Lines.en: Once more we meet in the sands of time!
Lines.zh: 我们又在这满是沙尘的时间线见面了！

Lines.en: Have you enjoyed my new and improved zombies?
Lines.zh: 你已经受过我那全新又先进的僵尸大军的洗礼了吧？

Lines.en: Or should I say ancient and improved?
Lines.zh: 或许我该称之为古老又先进？

Lines.en: Bah! They are nothing to my Zombot Sphinxinator 2.0!
Lines.zh: 管他呢！跟我的狮身人面降临者 2.0 相比不值一提！

Lines.en: Hey! Our lawnmowers are a-missing!
Lines.zh: 嘿！我们的小推车丢失了！

Lines.en: The timeline is exhibiting instabilities, User Dave.
Lines.zh: 这条时间线已经变得极不稳定了，用户戴夫。

Lines.en: Fixed-loop paradoxes are forbidding the presence of lawnmowers.
Lines.zh: 莫比乌斯环时空悖论让小推车不再存在了。

Lines.en: But I named the middle one "Mowie"!
Lines.zh: 可我已经给正对家门口的那辆取名“小推”了！

Lines.en: Murmering mummies! More mummies!
Lines.zh: 僵尸们的低吼更加沉重！更多的木乃伊正在来临！

Lines.en: The time fissure is strengthening zombies from all epochs, User Dave.
Lines.zh: 某处的时间裂缝将会导致各个时代的僵尸，戴夫先生。

Lines.en: We should expect more powerful versions of some zombies.
Lines.zh: 我们应该为此做好准备，以应对更强大的僵尸。

Lines.en: Wait a minute!
Lines.zh: 稍等一下！

Lines.en: There was never any meat in that taco.
Lines.zh: 我想起那个玉米卷里没有一块肉。

Lines.en: I still have Tofunky in my beard to prove it!
Lines.zh: 我的胡子里还有玉米卷屑呢，可以拿来证明我的清白！

Lines.en: Well, that just leaves more brains for us... later.
Lines.zh: 看样子我们能吃到更多脑子了……以后。

Lines.en: I'll find you again, in another where and another when!
Lines.zh: 我会再找上你们的，无论何时，无论何地！

Lines.en: Have you ever wondered why your neighbor David hungers so?
Lines.zh: 你有没有思考过为什么你的邻居戴夫总是如此饥饿？

Lines.en: What secret ingredient in the taco would drive his desire?
Lines.zh: 那个玉米卷里究竟加了什么秘密配方让他如此着迷?

Lines.en: Could it be that he needs your brains as much as we do?
Lines.zh: 和我们对你的大脑的渴求有点太像了不是吗？

Lines.en: Wha-?! No way. I would never eat a brain taco!
Lines.zh: 什么？！不不不可能。我不可能会想吃大脑玉米卷！

Lines.en: But, I don't remember what was in it...
Lines.zh: 但是，我也不是很清楚里面有什么……

Lines.en: There's a plant call on the banana phone. It's an S.O.S.!
Lines.zh: 有株植物用香蕉打了个电话过来。是求救信号！

Lines.en: They'll be sitting plants if we don't help. Let's take that root and save them!
Lines.zh: 如果不保护好他们，时空历史会被改写。快接下任务保护好他们！

Lines.en: This will be the first last stand. There will be more lasts to come.
Lines.zh: 这是我们遭遇的第一场坚不可摧。以后我们可要遭遇到更多的。

Lines.en: There's a plant call on the banana phone. It's an S.O.S.!
Lines.zh: 有株植物用香蕉打了个电话过来。是求救信号！

Lines.en: They'll be sitting plants if we don't help. Let's take that root and save them!
Lines.zh: 如果不保护好他们，时空历史会被改写。快接下任务保护好他们！

Lines.en: Though tetrahedrons are pyramids, this one is not a Platonic solid.
Lines.zh: 虽然四面体像金字塔，但它们不是柏拉图立体。

Lines.en: I'm so hungry, I would love a Platonic solid.
Lines.zh: 我好饿，给我来一份柏拉图立体吧。

Lines.en: User Dave, this is also not a taco salad.
Lines.zh: 戴夫先生，这次的柏拉图立体也不是玉米卷酱料。

Lines.en: This level is a locked coordinate in time.
Lines.zh: 本关是时间线上的一个确切节点。

Lines.en: You must take these plants to win.
Lines.zh: 你必须用选定好的植物取得胜利。

Lines.en: Otherwise, you risk distorting reality.
Lines.zh: 否则你就是在冒险尝试改写历史事实。

Lines.en: Never distort reality! You'll pull something.
Lines.zh: 千万不要扭曲历史！会牵引出不好的事物的。

Lines.en: It looks like a courier had his own delivery to make!
Lines.zh: 看样子那位快递员要先把自己的脑袋送回去先了！

Lines.en: This will be useful for traveling to other times.
Lines.zh: 这把钥匙将会协助你前往更多地方进行时空旅行。

Lines.en: Yeah! Time to try the Taco Map!
Lines.zh: 是啊！是该前往玉米卷时空了！

Lines.en: Greetings Temporal Commuters,
Lines.zh: 你好啊时空旅行者，

Lines.en: Special couriers have been dispatched to retrieve your brains.
Lines.zh: 我们已经派出了专门的外交员来取回你的大脑。

Lines.en: Please have your release forms signed before their arrival.
Lines.zh: 请在他们抵达前签署好免责声明。

Lines.en: Regards, Dr. Edgar Zomboss.
Lines.zh: 致辞，埃德加·僵尸博士。

Lines.en: Cool, that Mr. Boss guy wants your autograph!
Lines.zh: 酷毙了，那位博士先生想要你的签名！

Lines.en: This can't be good.
Lines.zh: 这可不是什么好事啊。

Lines.en: You can try out your Power Ups here!
Lines.zh: 这关你只能用金手指过关！

Lines.en: You have some Power Ups! You could try them out!
Lines.zh: 你获得了金手指功能！赶紧试试怎么使用吧！

Lines.en: Yeah, and now we can break the seal. Let's get crazy!
Lines.zh: 是啊，这次我们能毫无顾忌地使用它们。让我们狂欢起来吧！

Lines.en: Welcome to Ancient Egypt!
Lines.zh: 欢迎来到神秘埃及！

Lines.en: Please wait 4500 years for your taco to be ready... more or less.
Lines.zh: 请在此等待 4500 年，届时您的玉米卷将会降临……或许吧。

Lines.en: That doesn't smell right.
Lines.zh: 不过闻起来不像。

Lines.en: I'm sure my taco is around here somewhere, but in the meantime...
Lines.zh: 我确信我的玉米卷就在附近，但是同时……

Lines.en: These plants were made for plantin'.
Lines.zh: 总之先试试这些从家里带来的植物吧。

Lines.en: No need for sun.  Plants are coming via special delivery.
Lines.zh: 无需阳光，我们设计了一套植物生产线。
